org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def
Class AeCorrelationCombinations

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.AeCorrelationCombinations
public class AeCorrelationCombinations
extends java.lang.Object

Maintains a collection of the different correlation set combinations that exists for a single partnerlink and operation.

Nested Class Summary
 class AeCorrelationCombinations.AeCorrelatedProperties
          Wrapper object for the sets of properties that should be used to match an inbound receive.

AeCorrelationCombinations

public AeCorrelationCombinations()
Method Detail

add

public void add(java.util.Set aSetOfCorrelationSetDefs)
Adds the correlationSetDefs that are used for a given IMA. If this set of correlationSetDefs contains one or more join style correlationSetDefs then we'll set a flag on the class to indicate that we need to produce multiple combinations to handle the possibility of dispatching to an activity with an uninitialized correlationSet.

Parameters:
aSetOfCorrelationSetDefs -

createInitiatedCombinations

private java.util.Set createInitiatedCombinations()
The initiated combinations includes all of the properties for the correlationSets that should already be initiated at the time the message receiver executed. CorrelationSets that are set to initiate="yes" and have a single point of initiation do not have their properties included.

Returns:
SortedSet - a set of sets. The contained sets have all of the properties needed to compute the correlation hash. The set is sorted by the number of properties in descending order.

addInitiatedCorrelationSetProperties

protected void addInitiatedCorrelationSetProperties(java.util.Set aSet,
                                                    java.util.Iterator aIter)
Walks the iterator and adds all of the properties for each of the correlationSets to the set passed in.

Parameters:
aSet -
aIter - - iteration over a set of sets. The inner sets contain AeCorrelationSetDefs

createJoinStyleCombinations

private java.util.Collection createJoinStyleCombinations()
The join style combinations includes multiple combinations for a single IMA which accounts for the possibility that a correlationSet may or may not have been initiated at the time of the object's execution.

getJoinsIterator

protected java.util.Iterator getJoinsIterator()
Returns an iterator over the sets that contain "join" style correlation sets

Returns an iterator over the sets that contain the initiated correlation sets
